Hi, I'm Pablo Galindo

I have a passion for creating effective, and highly performant content-focused sites. I am currently building Cosmic Themes - production-ready website templates crafted with Astro and Tailwind CSS. I also write blog posts on tips, tricks, and tools to help you level up your websites.
